spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent adherence to the general layout and room adjacency. Door placements for the powder toilet and master suites are accurate. Slight scaling distortion in the entry passage width and the kitchen/utility wall thickness.

structural_fidelity.notes: Perfect structural adherence. All rooms accounted for, roof is properly removed, no text or UI elements are present, and the model is correctly floating on a dark neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture blocks (beds, sofas, dining set, kitchen counters) match the floor plan locations and orientation precisely. Slight deduction for the kitchen counter proportion versus the utility area sink representation.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong isometric orthographic projection. Low-poly style is captured well. Points deducted for the presence of soft shadows and slight gradients which deviate from a strictly 'flat shading' requirement.

detected_errors.description: Render contains soft shadows and subtle lighting gradients rather than purely flat shading.
Minor layout distortion in the thickness of the internal walls surrounding the utility and kitchen area.
